[![](https://my.hostige.com/assets/img/logo.png)](https://www.hostige.com/)

[Hostige's](https://www.hostige.com/) main goal is to provide outstanding and affordable services. From a hopeful startup to a sustainable business, always offering exactly what the clients needed. We back our customers with the quality and responsiveness that they expect, always being there when needed. Using state of the art technology and networks we are able to provide a premium hosting environment at a low price. With perfect uptime, fast professional support, and top notch hosting as our core focus we are confident that we will be your last hosting provider. We strive to achieve excellence through superior services. We offer OpenVZ, KVM, and LXC servers optimized for performance and stability. We know what it takes to get you up and running and we are here to help you do just that. Our experience is based on thousands and thousands of hours in direct contact with all types of clients with different technical related situations and scenarios successfully resolved. We've built our team around people with valuable experience in web hosting, virtualization, and customer support. We're a well constructed team and we take pride in being the most dynamic and flexible one you have ever worked with.
